column4: Hi I have to Reinstall Gutsy but the partitioners on the LIve CD / Alt CD just freeze up. What do I do?
Is fsck detecking a problem in there or is it detecting an improper removal or shutdown on that drive?
fsck detects that the boot sector and it's backup don't match when booting the computer, but that is it. I'm pretty sure it's a setting thing but I could be wrong
